body.name: Broom with Dustpan Combo Set,180° Rotating Long Handle Broom and Dust Pan Set for Home Kitchen Office Indoor Outdoor Cleaning,Easy Storage.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 25 mins
features: 🏞️【Effortless Cleaning of Various Debris】The broom bristles is made of premium materials,3 layer,thicker,can sweep dust hair and other small garbage easily.The 45-degree angle brush head design can easily clean corners and sanitary corners.

🏞️【Long Handle Broom and Dustpan】Refer to our installation instructions, you can easily assemble the broom and dustpan, the broom can reach 44 inches, the dustpan can reach 43 inches.No more bending over while sweeping, providing a comfortable and easy cleaning experience.The dustpan sits flush with the floor, preventing small garbage and dust from getting swept under it.

🏞️【Built-in Comb Teeth Dust pan】Our dustpan includes built-in comb teeth, allowing you to effortlessly scrape hair and dirt from the broom without direct contact, ensuring a sanitary cleaning experience.The dustpan has a deeper concave design, which can collect garbage very well.

🏞️【Easy Assembly and 180° Rotating Broom Head】 Follow our simple instructions for quick assembly. The 180° rotating broom head easily cleans hard-to-reach areas under beds, sofas, and cabinets, ensuring thorough cleaning in all directions.
🏞️【Space-Saving Foldable Design】This set is a true space saver! The broom securely fits inside the dustpan, This foldable design saves storage space, making it perfect for any home,easy storage.
body.description: # Folding 180 Degree Rotating Broom and Dust Set #★Package Included① a Broom Bristles Head② a Dust Pan③ 3 Stainless Steel Sticks that Connected Broom④ 3 Stainless Steel Sticks that Connected Dustpan⑤ 2 Plastic Handles for Broom and Dustpan Top★Warm TipsYou will receive a box with several pieces of broom dustpan assembly parts,don't worry and sad, it's easy to assemble, there are pictures of installation instructions in our list, follow the instructions you can get a complete set of broom and dustpan easily. If you still have any questions or other problem, please contact us without worry, we will try our best to help you.★FeaturesLong Handle 【Broom:44 inches】【Dust pan:43 inches】180 Degree Broom Head RotatableCan be folded, when not in use, the broom and dustpan can be tightly combined,easy storage.Thick and Soft broom bristlesDeeper and Built-in Comb Teeth Dust pan,lip flush with the floor★Good forDaily cleaning and sweeping of kitchens, rooms, offices, garages, gardens. It can clean all kinds of large or small garbage, dusts and more.Essentials household cleaning supplies

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't know what the other reviewers were looking for when they say the product is flimsy and not sturdy! This is a nice heavy plastic dustpan and broom with soft bristles. The handles are metal and screw together nicely once you figure out which piece goes with which... They do take a bit of turning, but once together they hold very well. Excellant quality for the price and a huge benefit for my 86 yr old father to use instead of bending over to use a regular dustpan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cheaply made. Reminds you of something you can find at the local dollar store. No real use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Broom pivots too much
reviews.reviewText: I’m glad I don’t have to bend down to pick up the sweeping anymore. However, the broom will easily pivot from side to side and this is annoying having to repeatedly “straighten” it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can handle quick clean up and disposal.
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly. Will come in handy for quick cleanup with those messy and dirty jobs for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The broom works pretty good and I like the dust pan w hair remover in it. Broom and dust pan are compact and has great stand up storage filter. Have to push dust pan down to use, would love to see an rubber end to sweep up dust better. Head has a swivel to get to harder to reach places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought; "well, I could just get new shafts(handles) because these aluminum ones, as well as the connections are too flimsy. Well friends, the whole thing is just too flimsy for even this low price. I won't be trying this one again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and handy
reviews.reviewText: This broom & dust pan came in handy because you don't have to ben down and pick up the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Es muy flexible. Para mi es ideal para barrer en las orillas de la estufa, en las esquinas de la cocina y en aquellos espacios pequeños que otra escoba por ser duras no barrerian. El color es muy bonito y todo bien. La recomiendo.
